macro.name: DAQ_AI_PORT_NAME
macro.description: Port name for AI DAQ Port. Defaults to cDAQ9185-MUONFEMod3

macro.name: DAQ_AO_PORT_NAME
macro.description: Port name for AO DAQ Port. Defaults to cDAQ9185-MUONFEMod4

macro.name: NELM
macro.description: Number of elements in sample data. Defaults to 100

macro.name: POWER_MIN_VOLT
macro.description: Voltage value (in kV) to determine when the separator is off. Defaults to 2

macro.name: VUPPERLIM
macro.description: Voltage stability upper limit (kV). Defaults to 1

macro.name: VLOWERLIM
macro.description: Voltage stability lower limit (kV). Defaults to 0

macro.name: ISTEADY
macro.description: Nominal stable current value (mA). Defaults to 0

macro.name: WINDOWSIZE
macro.description: Number of seconds in moving window. Defaults to 600

macro.name: MAXUNSTBL
macro.description: Maximum number of seconds allowed out of stability before alarm. Defaults to 30
